website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if style is as important as function.
pros: Stylish jacket that is designed to look good with all casual outfits
Multiple pockets to hold all essential items
cons: Customers have complained of ripped seams and broken zippers after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Not good at keeping you dry
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking jacket, but it didn't keep me dry in the rain. I was hiking in the wind and rain for just an hour and a half, and my clothes under the jacket were already wet. It wasn't even a strong downpour, just a medium drizzle with somewhat strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: The jacket fit perfect, but thats only because i read the other ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fit perfect, but thats only because i read the other reviews first. i would usually wear a large jacket but i ordered one size down. That was the consensus from others. I'm 5'10" 195 lbs and the medium fit perfect. HOPE THIS HELPS.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I own several Carhartt jackets, so I knew this rain jacket was going to be quality. Fits perfect. I'm looking forward to sloshing in the rain with it! lol
customer_reviews.author: Peter Novitch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket and so does everyone else! Everyone asks where I got it from. One down side to the jacket is that in heavy rainfall the material stops being resistant and you start to get wet underneath the jacket. But if you're using it for quick in and out of the rain then it works like a gem!
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Vogt

customer_reviews.title: This measures up well to the Columbia coat
customer_reviews.text: This coat was ordered for a guy as a present. He usually wears a large (5'10" size 36 pants), but I got him an XL so he can wear a hoodie under it. It had plenty of space for just that. It is ultra waterproof, and very lightweight. Can be rolled up tiny and tossed in a bag easily.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: #1 choice
customer_reviews.text: Don't really have to go into much detail here. I love the jacket and bought this one because I lost my last one. If I lose this one...I will order another. Do you see a trend here.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe size up?
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend normally wears a large in almost every brand. Carhartt almost always runs large, so he always wears a medium in Carhartt products. This jacket is the exception. I ordered him a medium and it was perfect over his t-shirt, but was too tight to put the jacket over a hoodie or multiple layers of clothing. Most people are going to want to be able to layer under a rain jacket, so definitely get your true size (not the size you usually are in carhartt products). He really likes this jacket and is glad to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Jae B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a birthday gift. He didn’t have a rain jacket and it’s currently rainy season right now in PA. Our son is in the hospital and we have to park about a mile away from the hospital and walk outside so this has definitely come in handy when it’s raining out so he isn’t soaked by the time he makes it inside. He really likes Carharrt jackets so he picked thus jacket out. I ordered the large in the black and it fits him great. He’s about 5’10” around 170-180lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket. Lightweight and fits in backpack without taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jacket. Lightweight and fits in backpack without taking much room. I would recommend this for 50 + degree weather. If used with thermal shirt you could easily use this in below freezing weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2017--still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket has served me very well at both work and play. I am extremely pleased with it. It got a little dusty-looking after a year, so I threw it into the washing machine, came out looking as new as the day I bought it. It may be the best all-round jacket I've ever had. I keep it on a rack by the door and it's the first thing I grab on the way out virtually all year round here. It still looks and wears great after three years now.
customer_reviews.author: AATZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling, for rain, wind, lightweight and warm !!
customer_reviews.text: One of the BEST Amazon purchases yet! Fit perfect, super lightweight AND it was a windbreaker too. The material totally holds in warmth. Perfect for rainy weather / traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Aronson

customer_reviews.title: NOT EVEN WATER RESISTANT
customer_reviews.text: Rain Defender?! Nope. Not even a little bit. Northern California rains are not, by any means, torrential downpours, but they can be quite brisk in bursts. Soaked to the bone immediately, very time. This was a complete waste of money, alas.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Too large in wrong places.
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated the size is a problem. It’s true you could order down a size but that will probably only help about half the people. Sleeves are way too long, which you could roll up but again not everyone wants to do that. If the size issue doesn’t put you off I guess it’s a serviceable jacket. Not for me though.
customer_reviews.author: James Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket, bad rainjacket
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for years, it's my go to jacket - very light, versatile, good for windy or moderately cold weather, cheep and soft to the touch. However it is not a rain jacket and it soaks wet just from a few drops of water. I'm only rating it so low because of the false advertisement, otherwise it's a perfect daily jacket in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Arima

customer_reviews.title: It's a LIGHT rain jacket.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is alright but pricey for what it actually does. It's just another LIGHT rain jacket that's pricey because it has Carhartt's name on it. You will get wet and the rain will soak through if it's anything other than a light rain, it certainly isn't good for working outdoors in the rain...so I don't know what the point of it is if that's what Carhartt's apparel is all about.
customer_reviews.author: R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large. Needed to order size down.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect in most areas. My son usually takes a size medium, but in this I had to exchange the medium for a small. Apparently Carhartt clothing runs large. The small fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: Liner designed poorly
customer_reviews.text: I like the jackets appearance, it fits and is waterproof as advertised. However, the liner gets stuck in the zipper at every wearing . This is very frustrating .
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Sized the old fashioned way!
customer_reviews.text: Carhartt is the American size/ a large is a large...! This jacket looks good and is going to Ecuador this winter with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality. tight in the shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: The first impression is satisfactory. The quality is good, but a little non-free shoulders, but not critical. it is strange that a brand positioning itself as a manufacturer of working clothes makes products not free in the shoulders and chest. Carhartt, your customers aren't teenagers. strange dimensional grid.
customer_reviews.author: andrii fomin

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket isn’t lined. So, it is perfect for layering underneathor not. It has a drawstring at the waist. The pockets have snaps so they aren’t flapping open. The hood is roomy. It is well made. I ordered an XL instead of my normal large to allow room for a sweatshirt. This jacket fits perfect- is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jalapeno Grits

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn it in the rain yet, but it fits great and looks good. I am 6' 225 and wear XL and ordered an XL and would say wile it is ever so slightly large the large would never fit. I have drop from shoulder to waist of 8 inches so while it fits great in the shoulder and chest it is a little large in the midsection, but this is pretty much the same with most jackets that fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in August 2019 -- Zipper teeth broken
customer_reviews.text: This Jacket has a plastic zipper and some teeth are broken and cannot zip the jacket. It is only 4 months old and was purchased for use in rainy weather. It has only been worn about 6 times and is totally useless now because the zipper won't zip. Jacket is not up to Carhardt quality standards -- very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Marge C

customer_reviews.title: My husband liked the jacket
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked the jacket. But when reading reviews they said how the jacket was a little large, some even ordered a smaller size. I am glad I did not order smaller. My husband is just at the start of a size large and this jacket fits well and he could probably won't be able to wear a sweatshirt under it. It is very lightweight. I did not want a heavy jacket, wanted a spring-fall raincoat, that was not vinyl or rubberized. I was expecting it to be a little heavier, though.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I get really hot in this jacket because there are absolutely no vents. I definitely wouldn't recommend this for the price, especially because I don't think the build quality is any better than other rain jackets even for a lesser price.
customer_reviews.author: Pattycakes

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me dry, looks nice too
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I wanted in a rain jacket. It's dry on the inside. It looks nice on the outside. And no evil sewer-clowns have tried to entice me into getting murdered, which is a nice change of pace for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Zen

customer_reviews.title: The fit is pretty spot on
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is definitly on the browner side of "breen". The fit is pretty spot on. I am 6'1", 205 and the sleeves fall where they should. As mentioned by others this is a simple rain shell. There is no insulation. All in all very pleased with this product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jacket for my son who works outside in all weather. This jacket is lightweight, looks good and very comfortable. The sizes do run big, he usually wears a large but after reading other reviews I ordered a medium. It fits great. I would recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfmom

customer_reviews.title: Ok thin, windbreaker that keeps the rain off
customer_reviews.text: It's very thin. The material inside the zipper constantly gets hung in zipper when you zip it up, very annoyed by that. Probably could have gotten something better for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: avidjeff

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good for made in Cambodia
customer_reviews.text: Those of you who have purchased Carhartt clothing before know a Large is Large. I'm 5'10 and 170lbs. The Medium fit perfectly. Enough room for a hoodie underneath. Quality is very good for made in Cambodia. If the rain coat was $39.00 it would get 5stars.
customer_reviews.author: cyclejock77

customer_reviews.title: Quality rain coat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat for my husband who works outdoors most of the time. It fit him exactly as expected, I bought him a large and he is 6' tall and 190lbs. The first day he wore it was about 50' out and light rain all day, and he didn't get wet at all, nor was he uncomfortable temperature-wise. Another quality item by Carhartt!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott1282

customer_reviews.title: Good Rain Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is nice, but not a 100% waterproof, but I did use it at an outdoor concert and it kept me dry for a few hours. It fits nice and keeps you warm. The fit was as expected. 6'6" slim build and I purchased a Large. The fabric is okay to the touch and does not bother me when I walk. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I bought a size too large on purpose which fit him fine, then he eventually grew into it to have ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this when my son was in 6th grade, he's now going into 9th and wont stop wearing it...I bought a size too large on purpose which fit him fine, then he eventually grew into it to have an even better fit. it's lightweight and keeps him dry..
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise for son. Carharrt never disappoints.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who is often outside in the elements dealing with contractors. He loved it as it is not something he would think to go purchase but he can keep in truck.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie7850

customer_reviews.title: Long jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket seems fine quality and looks nice. But the length was an issue for me. I ordered the M and it was good in most of the dimensions, but the jacket came down to mid-thigh. This was an issue because the jacket narrows dramatically at the bottom making it very tight and uncomfortable. If you are under 5'10" this will most likely be a long jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boyfriend, he's normally a large but after reading the comments, I went with a medium and it fits PERFECT. The length goes just below his pants pockets and he's able to hold his arms out and still have the sleeves cover what they need to. It's nice and light which is exactly what he wanted!
customer_reviews.author: naiomi

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper
customer_reviews.text: Based on the other reviews, my experience may be rare, but the zipper CONSTANTLY gets caught on the material, forcing you to zip down, pull out the material, and repeat. Terrible when you're trying to stay dry and your fingers may already be wet and cold.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nold

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice jacket. Keeps me dry and does break the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice jacket. Keeps me dry and does break the wind. I was surprised by how light it was. I'm 5' 10" and 205 and I ordered a large instead of the extra large I usually wear. Glad I didn't go two down! It fits pretty well and would have room for a flannel shirt underneath but not much else. Wish it had a tad more insulation, but it will do very nicely. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laney Rollins

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Warm Fall Rain Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is just what I wanted. It is warm and great for the fall. I like that it has a rain hood and the snaps work great on the pockets . It is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Order the correct size unless you wanted to fit really tight.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. a lot of views said the item ran large ordered a smaller size was way too small had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tweedt

customer_reviews.title: The rain beads up and runs off of me like a freshly waxed car
customer_reviews.text: Incredible raincoat from Carhartt! The rain beads up and runs off of me like a freshly waxed car, and while the ventilation could be an issue for rainy days with higher temperatures, it's the best Spring raincoat I've ever purchased. I would absolutely buy this again, but I think I would look for something with a removable lining.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rains

customer_reviews.title: Good rain coat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rain jacket. I bought this for my dad and all of the reviews said a medium fit like a large. I ordered a medium and I think it fit more like a medium. It fit him just fine but if you need a large normally I would get a large.
customer_reviews.author: Outlaws

customer_reviews.title: Not rain proof
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this jacket. Although not suitable for heavy rain and deep back country camping.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyphoto8

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jacket that was light weight, breathable, and could deter rain and this jacket did all of the above! It does well while it’s raining and it seems like the rain rolls off. The one negative as most have said, is it is a bit large in size to where the sleeves go to the middle of my hand. I really do enjoy the jacket and after about a month of owning it would buy it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Max Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit & perfect for the rainy days
customer_reviews.text: My husband looks SO handsome in this jacket. I love the dark color. He is 6' 3" & 250lbs. He is muscular & purchased the XL. It fits him really good. With all the rain we've been getting, it's nice for him to have this jacket instead of carrying around an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A great mid-weight rain coat.
customer_reviews.text: The Carhartt Rockford Rain Defender is a well made. Just roomy enough to give freedom of movement. Enough room for a sweater or fleece underneath, yet not too much so that it feels sloppy. Sturdy medium weight fabric and well placed roomy pockets.
customer_reviews.author: FbDavid Mason

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who works outside doing landscaping! He loves the durability and I love the value!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome find. I live in d.c and there summer thunderstorms here and this is great for this weather... very light and keeps you dry without getting too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Nice windbreaker
customer_reviews.text: I have a winter weight jacket and I wanted something light for spring and summer. This jacket has nice details for a windbreaker. I bought the xl like I have in the winter jacket and I can only just zip it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Originally

customer_reviews.title: I like the amount of things I can do with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of things I can do with this jacket. It keeps me and my phone and keys dry, and I can wire my headphones inside as well. I am a bit on the short side so that's why it could be a bit large on me, but other than the sleeves I enjoy this jacket for the rare downpours in Las Vegas. Instead of being the wet, miserable guy I'm the dry somewhat less miserable guy thanks to this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jacket. Im short and stocky. 5'-7" about 220. I got the XL. Fits amazing. Totally water resistant. Not water proof. Good for light rain. Breathable. Recommend yes.
customer_reviews.author: ScareMe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice windbreaker. Should work well in the damp Pacific Northwest springs. Inside pocket, too, always comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: EPL fan

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket and good quality. I'm glad I ordered a size larger than I am. When I seen the pictures of the snug fit on the man in the photo, I ordered X-large instead of Large (Which is what my measurement would suggest on the chart).
customer_reviews.author: Toolman

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. My bugout bag jacket
customer_reviews.text: Keep this in my truck at all times. Great for rainwear. Does get a little warm
customer_reviews.author: Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for just a raincoat.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item only bc it was made out of only the rain type material. I was expecting maybe a little insulation on the inside bc of the price.
customer_reviews.author: paul doane

customer_reviews.title: Great rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lightweight rain jacket that has served me well in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: LAQUINCY PRINGLE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine/ great jacket, I do love wearing it. Great fit for a thin to medium frame, mature colour, and intelligent utilitarian design (buttons, zippers, length, etc), HOWEVER while this will keep you -mostly- dry, do note that it's more akin to water-resistant rather than full on water-proof. I'm not saying I got "wet wet", but still a little damp during especially hard rains.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lolk

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my brother - he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I own one and my brother made a compliment on it...so, I owed him a favor and got him one. He loves it and so do I...great rain coat. Nice hood...keeps the wind and rain out
customer_reviews.author: Chris DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the size is a LOT smaller than normal
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the size is a LOT smaller than normal. I bought this for my wife and it barely fits my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Because it is a bit large, I can wear it over sweaters and light coats in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Dan I Rovner

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Chinese POS. Zipper began getting stuck in fabric until failure. Got a year of use out of it before I had to toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Great product by Carhartt
customer_reviews.text: Great product by Carhartt. Can withstand a light rain with no leaks. Good quality. The only downside is low breathability. After long wear my hoodie (or whatever i have underneath the jacket) gets wet due to "conservation ".
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Karpenko

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to zip
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is near impossible to zip. It gets stuck several times every time. The only way I can even get it to zip is reaching inside and holding back the flap that would otherwise get stuck in the zipper constantly.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is quite amazing! I know I said it is a bit large I was expecting that most of Carhartt's jackets usually fit a tad large. But other than that, these repel water amazingly. They are quite thin so it will rip easily, I already have a small rip in my arm after a week of working in it. Hey but that was expected. Other than that loved the Jacket. Another great product from Carhartt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carhartt Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, light weight windbreaker. This is a really nice, casual wind breaker and rain jacket. Does a good job of keeping you dry in windy, light rain weather. Slim enough to be compressed and packed as a light jacket for travel.

customer_reviews.title: very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Good jacket for adverse weather in spring and fall type seasons.

customer_reviews.title: would buy again

customer_reviews.author: Rick Lanners

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again

customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Very durable and keeps me dry. Totally satisfied.

customer_reviews.text: Bought 2xl for a Christmas gift and it fit my brother in law perfectly!

customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Nice and lightweight and good at keeping you dry. Like the large side pockets and the secret chest pocket on the inside.

customer_reviews.title: All around nice jacket that does a superb job of keeping you ...

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight  Rain Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Boyfriend and it is a nice lightweight rain jacket! If i could i would change the lining to a lightweight fleece!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: Overall Charhartt style jacket that fits the Male form perfectly. Long torso and arm length!!!!
customer_reviews.author: enevia baidoo

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good but it can be a little boxy
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good but it can be a little boxy. Other than that, keeps the rain out and is not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Light material Packs small but is thick enough to hold off a good soak.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this jacket runs on the larger side. I sized down one size and it fits perfectly. Light material Packs small but is thick enough to hold off a good soak.
customer_reviews.author: guy who bought a flask

customer_reviews.title: Good for chilly and/or rainy days.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good jacket for those days when it is too warm for a heavy coat but too cold for short-sleeves. I don't like wearing long-sleeved shirts, so this became a good alternative for me. It also easily fits under a heavy coat for added heat on those really cold days, and it makes a great raincoat. The only reason I took a star off is that the sleeves are a bit long for my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket. I'm a 2xl and the 2xl I got was a bit bigger than what I am so on cold days I can wear a hoodie under with plenty of room. Color is awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Same fit as medium in shoulders... however that extra few inches around the chest and waist is what was needed. Unfortunately my friends medium didn't come with the headphone passthrough to the inner pocket... but mine did! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Well built, will fit over a couple of layers, less than half the price of "upscale" rain-jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wells

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and it’s light weight. Purchased 2 jackets! True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and capable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, lightweight, easy to take along anywhere. When the wind picks up or the rain starts though, this jacket is amazingly tough. Runs plenty big, which I have no problem with in this style of jacket, I know it will go as an outer layer over almost anything, without looking "baggy" with light clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Zweng
